name: Drool of the Killer
description:
n empty bus moves through the town. Beneath the tiles of the swimming pool complex, a new world is striving to be born. This is the TAMMY show, coming soon to a city near you. But can BB escape it in time, or has she already gotten out of her depth?

Move with arrow keys or WASD. Use ENTER to confirm when prompted. A short cartoon mystery/horror game with no jumpscares. Made with Unity and Doodle Studio 95. Soundtrack by Tommy Tone. Mystery television by A. Degen. Water effects plugin by pure evil studio.

Soundtrack can be found here! https://trashtronix.bandcamp.com/album/of-the-killer
